abstract: Some legal experts say the European authorities may have a harder time winning the case because Microsoft may be losing market share.
snippet: Some legal experts say the European authorities may have a harder time winning the case because Microsoft may be losing market share.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  A year after ending its lengthy legal battle with the European Union, Microsoft, the software giant, is facing new charges of abusing its dominant position with the Windows operating system.

headline.main: Questions About Timing of Europe’s New Microsoft Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Timing Could Blunt a Microsoft Inquiry
